thread.title: Tiger Hills hockey set to begin on Oct. 23
thread.title_full: Tiger Hills hockey set to begin on Oct. 23

title: Tiger Hills hockey set to begin on Oct. 23
text:
Tiger Hills hockey set to begin on Oct. 23 By: Uncredited Report Error 
The Tiger Hills Hockey League will begin play on Oct. 23 and it will feature a new team. 
The Minnedosa Bombers have left the North Central Hockey League for the THHL this season and will join the East Division. However, the league will remain at 13 squads as the Swan Lake Cougars have taken a year’s leave of absence. Each team will play a 24-game schedule. 
Wayne Deschouwer returns as the league’s president, while Rodney White is the vice-president and Harvey Nichol is the referee-in-chief.
